The '''[[GLib]] Object System''', or '''GObject''', is a [[free software|free]] [[software library]] (covered by the [[GNU Lesser General Public License|LGPL]]) providing a portable [[object system]] and transparent cross-language interoperability. GObject is designed for use both directly in [[C (programming language)|C]] programs to provide object-oriented C-based APIs and through [[language binding|binding]]s to other languages to provide transparent cross-language interoperability.
+
The '''[[GLib]] Object System''', or '''GObject''', is a [[free software|free]] [[software library]] providing a portable [[object system]] and transparent cross-language interoperability. GObject is designed for use both directly in [[C (programming language)|C]] programs to provide object-oriented C-based APIs and through [[language binding|binding]]s to other languages to provide transparent cross-language interoperability.
